alert.note: Alert for Bent (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 5:58PM MDT until June 21 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL BENT COUNTY... At 557 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of John Martin Reservoir, or 26 miles northeast of North La Junta, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Hasty, John Martin Reservoir, Fort Lyon and Caddoa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If on or near John Martin Reservoir, get away from the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. remember, lightning can strike out to 15 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
